评论详情: Great quality, fits true to size and great value for money.
Absolutely fell in love with this the material is like silk everyone loved the outfit and he felt extra handsome the entire night
Good
I was pleasantly surprised with the quality of the shirt for my toddler. It is silky soft and very light, i plan to buy another one.

评论概述: Not a one time use outfit
评论详情: We thought it was going to be a cute one time use outfit but it is better made than we thought. The pants had to be rolled at up a bit and the have no elastic at the waist but the suspenders hold them up well. The susperder leather looking material did not look like it would hold up but it did. The bowtie clips onto the shirt. The pocket napkin is not removable, so won't lose it. Honestly looked great and everyone loved the outfit! Great purchase!! His two cousins had two other styles with the vest and those looked great also! Great value for the money. Great fit and looked very comfortable. He could use it for another party.

My daughter got this for her son for his cousins quinceanera and he was just absolutely adorable in this outfit. The quality of the material is very good and it is a bit wrinkly but he's two so that's bound to happen.

评论概述: Such a cute outfit I bought two
评论详情: Both brothers looked adorable in their outfits. It fit them well and it was made with a nice material.
Se ajusto bien 👍
Bought this for (2 yr old) grandson, formal night on cruise.  Well Made and great quality!

This would have fit my son perfectly if the length of the pants were longer. The shirt was perfect and the waist of the pants were spot on but the length of pant legs was too short and rested well above his ankles.
This little outfit is adorable.
It was true to size
Product was advertised as new showed up with stains on it
My kid wear size 18-24 month rn, and i ordered 18-24 months-fits perfect! Super cute!! The material is a little thin, but will be perfect paired with a blazer if it gets cold. Recommend 👍🏻
I needed this outfit for a family portrait. The pants had an orange spot that we couldn't get rid of. We ended up just using the shirt.
Fits well, my son gets compliments with every wear.

The material is not what I expected but it is not bad. Very cute outfit. True to size

This outfit was perfect for my son for our wedding it fit perfectly yo size looked just like the picture on Amazon I loved it and def recommend to anyone trying to dress up their little in pink for a certain occasion

Size fit was perfect. The quality was perfect. It was light weight ass my baby gets overheated quickly. It was vacuumed seal but a simple dry run removed all the wrinkles, color matched perfectly with my dress as we went to his school sneaker ball & it was worth the money
Good quality, shirt is silky material and pants are nicely made as well, bow tie snaps on.  Does run a tad big but overall adorable outfit for my little guy

This outfit would have been cute but i have to return it. For starters, I received it later than promised. When it finally came in, it looked like it had been worn with stains on the front and back of the shirt and on the back of the pants. Also there were no coveralls with the package. I needed it for an event this weekend.
This outfit is adorable!  Got for his sister's piano recital but it's something he can wear out also for a nice dinner or church! Just to look cute in! We love it!
Exactly as shown in the picture!! Very cute on my son and perfect for the occasion 😊

I have a nephew 5yrs old that needs some formal outfit for a wedding and this one is perfect. Simple and cute. This outfit fits him well. He is a small guy so this one has a room for him to grow. He also uses it for sunday church outfit and its cute.
My Grandson really liked his clothes! He loves bowties & suspenders!

评论概述: Adorable and soft shirt for my baby!
评论详情: The material of the shirt is so soft and comfortable for my baby. It's definitely more of a blue than black though.

I bought this outfit for a wedding that has a semi formal BLACK dress code. The color listed for this outfit was black. It is NOT black it is Navy blue. It’s still super cute and I can use it as dress clothes for church, but I’m frustrated by the incorrect information given.

I love this, is nice and lightweight, and it fits well. The colors are gorgeous and I love that the bow tie is attached so I don't have to worry about tying it. It does fit well around the neck, no big gap or hanging awkwardly. True to size.
I love this outfit. So cute. Material looks amazing and nit cheaply made. Would recommend !
The fit is great, the quality is great for the price. But this is literally the CUTEST OUTFIT YOU WILL EVER BUY! Literally crying at how cute my little guy is in it! Thank you!!!

A great springtime or easter outfit for your kiddo. The fabrics are lightweight, and the buttons and snaps are all durable. There's even a little snap for the bowtie for easy dressing up. It was a little hilarious trying to get the suspenders to work without having the pants hiked up around my kiddo's bellybutton. He's a very active boy, though, and these have stood up to him wearing them without any trouble.

Love this boy suit! Got this for my son and it fits him perfectly! This is true to size. The quality seems okay and the fabric is thin. Love how cute the long sleeve is with the bow. Love the pants and love that you can choose to wear the pants with or without the suspender. Love it!
Such a nicely made suit,the color combination and design of suit is so unique.Lightweight and soft.
The fabric does feel a little bit cheap, but it is still a cute outfit and my son and his suspenders and bowtie will look dapper on Easter.

I like the look of this set. It is a coordinated shirt, pants, bow tie, and suspenders. It is a value for all the pieces. It fits true to size. However, the material is very thin and it is very wrinkly.
This is a very cute outfit but it is not black. It’s blue.
Made their teacher blush and tear up for valentine's day. 5 🌟
The clothes weren't stiff or harsh on the skin. They were very soft and comfortable for my son. The bow tie button to the top of the shirt so it wasn't uncomfortable around the neck
Super easy slip on. Looks great. Lots of compliments.
Perfect fit and quality. Would buy again
I love that the bow was a snap on! He looked so handsome for his winter photos. Thank you for the quality and style of the outfit!
very cute. it was worn for a wedding. fit my 5 year old perfectly. the shirt is very soft & the quality is good too.
This little outfit is so cute in person! My grandson is one, and I ordered the 2-3 years size. The suspenders and bowtie fasten onto the outfit securely.
It was nice and for my son bun on the back was a thread if I pull it will ruined the shirt.

Lo compré para una sección de foto de mi bebe. Compré un Size 18-24 meses; el pantalón le quedó bastante largo pero justo y la camisa quedó al justo. Si van a compra para un niño de un año deben comprar Size 2T para que lo puedan usar más de una vez
